meanings.definition: To gather together in one place or group.
meanings.sent1: The team assembles for their weekly meeting in the conference room.
meanings.sent2: She quickly assembles all her friends for a group photo.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces magically assembles themselves into a complete picture.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seem to assemble into beautiful constellations at night.
meanings.sent5: The ants tirelessly assemble their food in the anthill, working together efficiently.

meanings.definition: To fit together the separate component parts of a machine or other object.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic assembles the engine with precision and care.
meanings.sent2: He carefully assembles the model airplane using the instructions.
meanings.sent3: The robot assembles itself from scattered parts in the sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: The jigsaw pieces perfectly assemble into a complete picture.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter skillfully assembles the wooden furniture in his workshop.

meanings.definition: To come together for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The community assembles to clean up the park on Earth Day.
meanings.sent2: Students assemble in the auditorium for the school assembly.
meanings.sent3: The superheroes assemble to save the city from the villain's evil plan.
meanings.sent4: The ingredients in the recipe assemble to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The protesters assemble peacefully to voice their concerns in front of the government building.
